name: DEAL OF THE WEEK: 5A Virgin Brazilian Three Bundle Deals
description: PLEASE READ BEFORE PURCHASING! 5A Grade Hair 100% Human Virgin Hair Completely Unprocessed (No Dye or Chemical Treatment) Full Cuticle Hair Single Drawn (From One Donor) Tangle Free Minimum to No Shedding Can Be Bleached, Dyed or Permed This hair can last 6-12 Months (or longer) with proper care. This hair is completely REUSABLE Hair comes in natural off black or brown color Each bundle weighs 3.5oz Wondering how many bundles to purchase? Here are the recommended amounts for a full install: 12"-16" = 7-10.5oz (2-3 Bundles) 18"-22" = 10.5-14oz (3-4 Bundles) 24"-28" = 14-17.5oz (4-5 Bundles) 30" and up 17.5oz or more (5 Bundles or More) KEEP IN MIND THAT the LONGER the bundles the SMALLER the wefts (they still weigh 3.5oz). **Adding a closure will help to create a full head. Be sure to check out the Hair FAQ page for tips and information about each hair origin. Also be sure to read the Shipping and Return Policy Page. SHIPPING: Shipping takes 7-10 Business Days (Mon-Fri 9am-5pm) Processing is 3-6 Business Days, this time is used to wash and deep condition your bundles then allow them time to air dry. USPS delivers in 2 days however it could take up to 5. You will be emailed with a tracking number via USPS.com once your order is shipped. CUSTOM COLOR & OMBRE: Please email glamorouslygorgeouscreations@gmail.com and in the subject line please put Name-Order Numer-CUSTOM COLOR CHOICE then in the message field describe in detail the colors that you would like, if able please provide pictures. If the exact color is not available I will match it as closely as I can. U-PART WIGS: Please email glamorouslygorgeouscreations@gmail.com and in the subject line please put Name-Order Numer-U-PART WIG then in the message field please provide any details about your wig that will help me, please tell me if you have a small or large head, if you would like a middle or side part, and if you would like combs. RETURN POLICY: ALL SALES ARE FINAL! Please check out the Customer Review page before placing your order. Please understand that the hair cannot be returned due to sanitary issues. I examine all hairs before shipping to you. If you are experiencing issues with your hair within a month I do provide free repair services.

Be sure to check out the Hair FAQ page for tips and information about each hair origin. Also be sure to read the Shipping and Return Policy Page. SHIPPING: Shipping takes 7-10 Business Days (Mon-Fri 9am-5pm) Processing is 3-6 Business Days, this time is used to wash and deep condition your bundles then allow them time to air dry. USPS delivers in 2 days however it could take up to 5. You will be emailed with a tracking number via USPS.com once your order is shipped. CUSTOM COLOR & OMBRE: Please email glamorouslygorgeouscreations@gmail.com and in the subject line please put Name-Order Numer-CUSTOM COLOR CHOICE then in the message field describe in detail the colors that you would like, if able please provide pictures. If the exact color is not available I will match it as closely as I can. U-PART WIGS: Please email glamorouslygorgeouscreations@gmail.com and in the subject line please put Name-Order Numer-U-PART WIG then in the message field please provide any details about your wig that will help me, please tell me if you have a small or large head, if you would like a middle or side part, and if you would like combs. RETURN POLICY: ALL SALES ARE FINAL! Please check out the Customer Review page before placing your order. Please understand that the hair cannot be returned due to sanitary issues. I examine all hairs before shipping to you. If you are experiencing issues with your hair within a month I do provide free repair services.

name: Virgin Brazilian Deep Curly 12"-30"
description:
*THESE PRICES ARE INDICATED FOR ONE BUNDLE*

PLEASE READ ...

Before selecting, please read the FAQ section to determine which typr of hair is best for you. Also read the FAQ for other important information about the hair.

Two bundles is enough for an install however if lengths are: 
12"-18" two to three bundles will make a full head 
20"-26" three to four bundles will make a full head 
28"-34" four to five bundles will make a full head

About this hair: 
Each Bundle is 100g (3.5oz) Approx 
100% Authentic from donors who are of Brazilian race. 
Grade 5A - Unprocessed Virgin Hair 
Color comes in Natural Black/Brown 1B 
Minimal shedding (Customized wefting available - See weft sealing option in product list) 
Very minimal tangling 
Cuticles are intact, hair can be bleached, dyed, permed, curled, cut, washed, conditioned or worn in natural texture.

Shipping takes 7-10 business days via USPS Priority, Express shipping is available ONLY after 3-5 day processing time.

You must email me with details about coloring or wigs within 24 hours of your order.

Please email glamorouslygorgeouscreations@gmail.com to make arrangements.

name: Express Shipping
description:
PLEASE READ! 
Express shipping is available only after the 3-5 business day processing time. For immediate processing please try to place your order before 5PM EST. Business days are Monday-Friday 9AM-5PM.  Express shipping is NON-REFUNDABLE.

Regular priority shipping will take a full 7-10 business days.

Example ...
If you place your order on Monday the 1st at 11AM then you will receive it no later than Tuesday the 9th (the following business day after 5 business days and at the earliest it will arrive on the 6th). Please keep in mind rgar some express shipping may take 2 days instead of overnight according to the postal service in your area.

Virgin Brazilian and Peruvian Closures

1.Quality:No shedding,no tangle,no lice

3.Lace material: Swiss lace
3.Lace size: 4'' by 4''
4.Weight: 30-50g
5. hair lengths 12inches,14inches,16inches,18inches
6.Virgin remy human hair style,Can be dyed and curled easily

Virgin Brazilian Silk Based Closures

1. Size is 4x4
2. Base colors come in light brown,medium brown,dark brown / black / beige (please email me with choice)
3. Hidden knots natural looking ,touch soft,no shedding, no tangle
4. Color 1B
5. Grade AAAAA quality direct manufacturer
6. Baby hair is around the perimeter of any texture for free as the customer demand

options.name: 14" Brazilian Body Wave Silk Based Closure

name: Custom U-Part Wigs
description: PLEASE READ BEFORE PURCHASING! Easily maintain your hair and help it last longer by making it into a wig! Protect your natural hair and save yourself the hassle of sitting down for a sew in! I will create your custom U-Wig or Full Wig. Once you order please email a picture of how you would like your wig to glamorouslygorgeouscreations@gmail.com.

name: Glam Hair Care
description:
Garnier Fructis Color Shield is perfect for protecting your custom colored and ombre bundles. This shampoo and conditioner combo will fortify the hair and protect it from color loss. It's filled with
Acai berry and grape seed oil + uva and uvb protectant especially made for color-treated hair.

Garnier Fructis Triple Nutrition is especially made to keep the hair moisturized. It is packed with three nourishing fruit oils - olive, avocado and Almond. It's fortified and infuses with nutrients for silky hair that's full of life.

Weft Sealer is designed to preserve the hair and prevent excessive shedding.

options.name: Garnier Fructis Color Shield Shampoo and Conditioner Set
Garnier Fructis Triple Nutrition Shampoo, Conditioner and Moisturizing Treatment
